        Parameters:
        actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor

      • takeDamage

        public java.lang.String takeDamage(int points,
                                   Actor otherActor,
                                   GameMap map)
        Description copied from interface: ActorInterface
        Actor takes the damage, i.e. health point is deducted by the damage value of the weapon used in attack
        Parameters:
        points - number of hitpoints to deduct.
        otherActor - The other actor performing the attack action to the current actor.
        map - The map the other actor attacking the current actor is on.
        Returns:
        A string that describes the damage taken by target, e.g. "Zombie drops an arm"
